Class VariableChoiceNumKey

java.lang.Object
  de.must.appletserver.RemoteElement
      de.must.appletserver.MustComboBox
          de.must.appletserver.VariableChoiceNumKey
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionInterpreter, AppletTalker, Remotable, RemoteContent, Updatable, ContextHelp
public class VariableChoiceNumKey
extends MustComboBox
implements ContextHelp

A JComboBox with statically filled content via numeric keys and their descriptions.
